title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: March 27, 2023, 05:33:32 PMLast edit: March 27, 2023, 07:16:56 PM by MoparMiningLLC
content: Up for auction is a Bitcoin Penny® DOGE Edition Short Roll (x20 Coins) - only 40 produced & no longer for sale on the website.The auction winner will also receive an extra DOGE Commemorative Coin.description from original sales thread:Quote from: BitcoinPenny on October 06, 2021, 04:07:21 PMBitcoin Penny® DOGE Edition Short Roll (x20 Coins)     Guaranteed to contain ONE (1) special “Missing Mint Mark” coin!     Rolled in that classic brown, heavyweight Kraft paper.     Wrapped in our “bulletproof” sleeve for ultimate protection!     Perfect for the Dogecoin enthusiast who simply wants a fistful of great Dogecoin swag!     Production limited to 40 only.Auction Terms:Auction is for 1 short roll of 2021 Bitcoin Penny DOGE coins - original box and coa will also accompany the roll.Starting Bid:  0.000 BTCBid Increments:  0.001 BTC please keep to 3 decimal placesAuction Ends:  Wednesday, 5 April 2023 @ 1pm ESTSniping:  A bid in the final 10 minutes adds 10 minutes to the end of the auction time, this continues until no bid has been made for 10 minutesExcluded from Bidding:   I may exclude/disqualify bidders, or require a deposit, for any bidders at my sole discretion.  Shipping:  At cost and in addition to the winning bid.  Ships from USA.  Buyer responsible for any local customs/duties. Can also be sent to minerjones for consolidated reshipping.Payment due within 24 hours of auction closing and in BTC to address: bc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4es
